job_tasks.phrase: shape our product vision, architecture, and roadmap
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to understanding the business context and aligning technical direction with strategic goals.

job_tasks.phrase: aligns with market needs and our company vision
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the need to understand and connect technical output with business and market requirements.

job_tasks.phrase: Leading the development of our AI-powered recruitment platform, from ideation to execution.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates responsibility for the end-to-end software development lifecycle of an AI-powered product.
This explicitly mentions performing development tasks, which falls under software development.

soft_skills.phrase: instrumental in shaping our product vision, architecture, and roadmap
You're not just a leader; you're a doer, a builder, and a visionary.
Contributing to a culture of innovation, excellence, and continuous learning
Leading the development of our AI-powered recruitment platform
Building and guiding a high-performing tech team
balancing hands-on development with strategic leadership

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on leadership, product vision, team building, and general software development rather than specific AI modeling tasks. While it mentions an 'AI-powered recruitment platform,' it lacks details on generative AI techniques, LLMs, or other core GenAI Engineer responsibilities.
